revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Flower Paradise. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Base Health !! Boss !! Base Health |- | [[File:Vileplume.png|40px]] Vileplume || rowspan=7 | <center> 2,603,000 || [[File:Venusaur.png|40px]] Venusaur || <center> 9,900,000 |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout || rowspan=2| [[File:Meganium.png|40px]] Meganium || rowspan=6| <center> 11,000,000 |- | [[File:Exeggutor.png|40px]] Exeggutor |- | [[File:Bellossom.png|40px]] Bellossom || rowspan=2|[[File:Shaymin.png|40px]] Shaymin (Land) |- | [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom |- | [[File:Sunflora.png|40px]] Sunflora || rowspan=2| [[File:Shaymin(sky).png|40px]] Shaymin (Sky) |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia |}
== Items ==
The following items can be obtained from opening chests in this dungeon.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 50% |}
